content.raw: This function is not called at every time step. It is called once in Load, then whenever the switch state changes, with throttling to wait 0.5 seconds between switches. It is also called whenever a ros message is published to the cheat topic direction/cmd. With these safeguards in place, I'd prefer to publish a little more often than necessary to ensure that the visuals are correct.
